_description: A courtly maying song — one 9-line tail-rhyme stanza

BLAdd31922.First Lines: In may that lusty sesounto geder the flours down by the medows grene…
BLAdd31922.Last Lines: …the nyghtyngale sang on hie ioyfullyso merely Among the thornys kene
BLAdd31922.Note: At end, more notes with “ut supra.”
